授業目的: The primary purpose of the course is to help students understand what engaging presentations are and give students opportunities to hands-on practices of making and giving effective presentations. You will learned and apply the presentation zen techniques and extend presentation skills by making several different types of presentations. At the same time, you will practice using English skills effectively.
到達目標:
1. You are able to extend their presentation skills by making several different types of presentations.
2. You are able to understand and apply the presentation zen approach.
3. You are able to use of Powerpoint and other applications for presentations.
4. You are able to effectively use and develop their English skills.
授業方法:
- During the online period: No class on April 16; from April 23, zoom real-time sessions will be conducted at the class time until in-person class is available again. These zoom sessions will be recorded and uploaded on OneDrive. More details will be given via LUNA.
- For the students permitted to take class online during the in-person period: You will participate in the within-class zoom real-time sessions.
